amendment.description: Amendment sought to permit civil actions against food manufacturers or sellers who negligently violate federal or state statutes regarding the manufacturing, marketing, distribution, advertisement, labeling, or sale of a food product.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in the Congressional Record to permit civil actions against food manufacturers or sellers who "negligently" violate federal or state statutes regarding the manufacturing, marketing, distribution, advertisement, labeling, or sale of a food product.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Inslee amendment (A005) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Inslee.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Inslee amendment (A005) Failed by voice vote.
